text: Type 59 may refer to: *Type 59 tank, Chinese main battle tank *Type 59, Chinese copy of the Makarov 9 mm PM pistol *130 mm towed field gun M1954 (M-46) (Chinese copy: Type 59-1) *57 mm AZP S-60 (Chinese copy: 57 mm Type 59 Heavy anti-aircraft gun) *KS-19 (Chinese copy: 100 mm Type 59 medium anti- aircraft gun) *Universal machine gun 7.62mm vz. 59 *A Chinese clone of the Soviet RGD-5 fragmentation grenade *Bugatti Type 59 racing car of the 1930s
title: Type 59
